Turnover Tax (Amendment) Act No. 6 of 1989  {Certified on 11th May, 1909]  LD—O 14/89  An Act To AMEND THE Turnover Tax Act, No. 69 or 1981  BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist  Republic of Sri Lanka as follows :—
1. This Act may be cited as the Turnover Tax (Amend- Short title,  ment) Act, No. 6 of 1989,

2. and the withholding turnover tax deducted under  section 50a; and”,
